DOC.brief_summary: To study weekly injection LY2189265 compare placebo blood glucose measure glycosylated hemoglobin ( HbA1c ) change baseline 16 week overweight Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus participant .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Dose Titration LY2189265 Overweight Participants With Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus
DOC.criteria: Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus > 3 month history prior enter trial , base disease diagnostic criterion American Diabetes Association ( ADA 2007 ) . Men woman 18 year age old . Women must negative pregnancy test willing use birth control study duration one month post . Have glycosylated hemoglobin ( HbA1c ) > 7.0 % ≤10.5 % determined central laboratory screening . Have body mass index ( BMI ) 27 40 kilograms/meter square ( kg/m^2 ) , inclusive . Have dos 3 month approve combination 2 oral antihyperglycemic medication combination follow : sulfonylurea ( e.g . Chlorpropamide Diabinese , Glimepiride Amaryl , Tolbutamide Orinase , Tolazamide Tolinase , Glipizide Glucotrol , Glyburide also know Micronase , Diabeta , Glynase ) , biguanides ( e.g . Glucophage metformin ) , thiazolidinediones ( e.g . Rosiglitazone Avandia , Pioglitazone Actos ) , dipeptidyl peptidase 4 ( DPPIV ) inhibitor ( e.g . Sitagliptin Januvia ) . A combination pill 2 drug allow ( 1 ) , ( e.g . Metformin Glipizide Metaglip ) , ( e.g . Metformin Glyburide Glucovance ) , ( e.g . Pioglitazone Glimepiride Duetact ) , ( e.g . Sitagliptin Metformin Janumet ) . Have know Type 1 Diabetes Mellitus Have take glucagonlike peptide1 ( GLP1 ) GLP1 analog drug ( Byetta ) Have history unstable angina , heart attack ( myocardial infarction ) , heart arrhythmia ( ventricular ) , congestive heart failure , coronary intervention ( percutaneous transluminal coronary angioplasty [ PTCA ] , open heart surgery , coronary artery bypass graft [ CABG ] ) , transient ischemic attack ( TIA ) stroke ( cerebrovascular accident ) last 6 month prior screen . Have acute chronic hepatitis elevate liver function test ( alanine transaminase ) , history chronic recurrent pancreatitis . Have renal disease serum creatinine ( blood test ) > 2 milligram per deciliter ( mg/dL ) . If take biguanides ( e.g . metformin Glucophage ) , DPPIV inhibitor ( e.g . Sitagliptin Januvia Janumet ) , creatinine must ≤1.5 mg/dL . Currently take prescription counter medication prevent weight loss .
